name: Live Action Crap RPG
description:
I made a game out of a scene that popped into my head under the covers as I went to bed at night, and sure enough, it was a crap game.

It is a trash game that takes 15 minutes to finish.

This game was created using the materials included in the RPG Tucool MV Season Pass.

This game was created using the Yanfly Engine.

・Development tool：RPG Maker MV
